class.name: Rect2
class.description: Rect2 consists of a position, a size, and several utility functions. It is typically used for fast overlap tests.

method.name: Rect2
method.description: Constructs a [code]Rect2[/code] by position and size.

method.name: Rect2
method.description: Constructs a [code]Rect2[/code] by x, y, width, and height.

method.name: clip
method.description: Returns the intersection of this [code]Rect2[/code] and b.

method.name: encloses
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [code]Rect2[/code] completely encloses another one.

method.name: expand
method.description: Returns this [code]Rect2[/code] expanded to include a given point.

method.name: grow
method.description: Returns a copy of the [code]Rect2[/code] grown a given amount of units towards all the sides.

method.name: grow_individual
method.description: Returns a copy of the [code]Rect2[/code] grown a given amount of units towards each direction individually.

method.name: grow_margin
method.description: Returns a copy of the [code]Rect2[/code] grown a given amount of units towards the [Margin] direction.

method.name: has_no_area
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]Rect2[/code] is flat or empty.

method.name: has_point
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]Rect2[/code] contains a point.

method.name: intersects
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]Rect2[/code] overlaps with another.

method.name: merge
method.description: Returns a larger Rect2 that contains this Rect2 and [code]with[/code].
